TopicTitle: [Mod Craft] The Bird of Krey - Includes IVA and movable wings

Articles.Content:
This can be downloaded at [http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/228806-spaceliner](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/228806-spaceliner)

Has IVA, movable wings, and built in claw landing gear

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-23T08:58:48Z" title="03/23/2015 08:58  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 23, 2015</time> by unsociableTim**
  
changing mod URL
Is this a mod, or does it just use mods?
Wow soo Cool .. I love the IVA aswell, nice job Tim
It is a mod. I made it all from scratch. It uses no other mods.

actually this is not my best work...I am doing another bird of prey that is going to be like a "luxury" bird of prey??? It is basically what it would be like if I had the keys to the vehicle. That is why the textures are kind of aweful. I was trying to stay true to the Bird of Prey in the movies. This time the textures are very detailed and well placed as well as some other improvements such as disruptor cannons that extend and missiles peaking out of missile bays which open up in battle mode.
